tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EdTechPlatform (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(50),
    grade INT,
    assessment TEXT,
    evaluation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Grades ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  student_id UUID, 
  course_id UUID, 
  grade INT, 
  created_at TIMESTAMP 
)

CREATE TABLE Assessments ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  course_id UUID, 
  assessment_name VARCHAR(255), 
  max_score INT, 
  created_at TIMESTAMP 
)

CREATE TABLE StudentEvaluations ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  student_id UUID, 
  evaluation_text TEXT, 
  rating INT, 
  created_at TIMESTAMP 
)

CREATE TABLE Courses ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  course_name VARCHAR(255), 
  instructor_name VARCHAR(255), 
  start_date DATE, 
  end_date DATE 
)

CREATE TABLE students (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    dob DATE
);
